title: Understanding Watermarks
text: A watermark is often used in documents to indicate the status or confidentiality level. Think about how this might apply to a worksheet.

title: Characteristics of a Watermark
text: Consider the visual appearance of a watermark. Is it something that stands out prominently, or is it more subtle?

hintAnswer: a $$semi-transparent$$ text overlaid on the worksheet that is used to convey something about the state of the worksheet
title: Defining a Watermark
text: What is a watermark in the context of a worksheet?
choices: a $$semi-transparent$$ text overlaid on the worksheet that is used to convey something about the state of the worksheet
>a bold text that is prominently displayed on the worksheet
>a hidden text that is not visible on the worksheet
>a colorful image that covers the entire worksheet
